MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance object InitializeLifetimeService() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gives the protocol handler an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.
Docs.returns: An object that is used to control the lifetime policy for this instance.
